name: New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Rain Cloud

details.description:
The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Rain Cloud features a grey mesh upper with tonal jagged suede overlays and a reflective New Balance logo. From there, a cream Nrgy midsole and grey outsole complete the design.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Rain Cloud released in August of 2021 and retailed for $150.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Phantom features a charcoal mesh upper with monotone jagged suede overlays and unfinished edges. From there, a black Nrgy midsole and matching outsole add the finishing touches.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Phantom originally released in August of 2021 and have since re-released multiple times. The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack retailed for $150. The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Phantom re-released in 2024.

The New Balance 2002R Off White is a running shoe that comes in a Beige Off White colorway.

This sneaker features an upper constructed with mesh, leather and suede with grey tones around the collar. Other details include jersey lining, a padded tongue and collar, the "N" logo on the sides, and the "2002R" on the lateral just below the collar. Rounding out the design is a textured ACTEVA LITE rubber midsole that utilizes the ABZORB cushioning technology and a black treaded N-ergy rubber outsole.

The New Balance 2002R Off White was released on September 2nd, 2022, retailing at $120.

name: New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Sea Salt

details.description:
The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Sea Salt features a Sea Salt textile upper with tonal jagged suede overlays and unfinished edges. From there, a cream Nrgy midsole and grey outsole complete the design.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Sea Salt released in August of 2021 and retailed for $150.

Slick, stylish and as durable as any athletic shoe needs to be, the New Balance 2002R Cordura Phantom Black is a hardcore anti-abrasion, all-terrain shoe, delivering rugged toughness to the game of life.

Combining suede and Cordura, these monochromatic sneakers deliver not just on-trend looks, but hardy wearability too. With Phantom black from colorways to soles, they adapt to most outfits and occasions with a sleek silhouette that holds tight to the traditional New Balance look. With high-powered mid and outsoles adding bounce to your step and superior traction, you can find the bold N logo on the side as well as the back heel and rubber toe. The Cordura fabric logo brings the only pop of color in bright orange and white on the outer sides.

We love the distinctively masculine design of these New Balance trainers in solid black. Good-looking shoes that present as ready to tackle any job or sport, the New Balance 2002R Cordura Phantom Black was released on October 5, 2024, priced at $145.

The New Balance 2002R Black Gunmetal is a performance running shoe with interior technical features inspired by the MR2002.

The sneaker boasts a breathable mesh upper with cut-out suede and leather overlays. Suede detailing can also be found on the heel and forming the mudguard. Although the shoe features ABZORB SBS pods in the heel for increased energy return and an ABZORB midsole for added cushioning, it appears light. Another element that makes the sneaker stand out is the black-on-grey colorway of Gunmetal, Phantom, and Black, which creates a stealthy look. In terms of branding, the New Balance "N" graces the lateral side panel, and "2002R" can be found on the mesh upper.

Our experts like how the white midsole contrasts the dark tones of the upper. The New Balance 2002R Black Gunmetal was released on October 21st, 2022, and retailed for a price of $140.

The New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey blends urban looks with technical capabilities that offer a smart, quieted sneaker for versatile use. This edition leverages New Balance’s expertise in ergonomic design and long-lasting construction with refined, contemporary fashion.

The Black Dark Grey 2002R by New Balance features a suede and mesh upper in dark tones for breathability and structure. The ABZORB midsole technology offers shock absorption and comfort, while the N-ergy outsole gives you extra stability. Released as part of New Balance’s 2000 series, which originally debuted in 2010, this model maintains classic running-shoe elements with modern updates to give you a shoe that highlights the brand’s renowned craftsmanship and futuristic design.

What we love about the New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey are its ABZORB cushioning for lasting comfort and the sturdy N-ergy outsole for added stability. Released at $145 on July 3, 2024, these features combine seamlessly for an everyday sneaker.

The New Balance 2002R Steel Grey Orca is an iteration of the New Balance 2002R running sneaker in a ‘Steel Grey Orca’ colorway.

This sneaker’s upper is made of a Grey mesh base cut out by Steel and Lead Grey leather overlays on the toe box. Lead Grey accents also appear on the upper eyelets, quarter panel, and the upper part of the tongue. The top overlay, which dominates the upper, features a premium Suede build in a Steel Grey tone highlighted by a Light Grey ‘N’ logo with a White outline and ‘2002R’ branding on the lateral ankle. A White Absorb midsole and a Black N-ergy outsole round out the design.

The New Balance 2002R Steel Grey Orca White was made available on October 21st, 2022, retailing at $140.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Eclipse combines elements of the New Balance 2002 and the 860 and lends an edgy design to the upper. Dressed in a stealthy colorway with hits of earth tones, this runner also has a bit of a trail shoe vibe.

The Protection Pack Eclipse iteration of the New Balance 2002R features an upper with a base of black ripstop overlaid with layers of jagged dark blue and gray nubuck that give the upper both style and structure. The heel counter is black, laid over a goldish-tan ripstop with New Balance branding. Cord laces with a lock at the top complete the rough and ready look of this upper.

What our experts appreciate most about this shoe is its high-performance sole unit. The midsole is constructed of ABZORB boosted with N-ergy, with absorbing SBS in the heel for enhanced cushioning. The black rubber outsole is ridged and lugged for traction and vented for midsole expansion. The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Eclipse was released on September 21, 2023, for $160 retail.

The New Balance 2002R Linen is a reimagined version of the sneakers from the early 2000s with a unique texture.

This iteration of the New Balance 2002R is made with an off-white mesh upper. Mesh dominates the toe box and the sides of the shoe, while the rest of the design is formed by suede overlays. Off-white hairy suede rounds out the toe box and runs under the laces from the top to the sole in several layers. Gray hairy suede appears around the top of the laces, while a wavy strip of off-white suede runs in waves back around the heel. The signature New Balance "N" appears in white on each side outlined in metallic silver, and the heel features an NB logo. The heel is also perforated for breathability. The tongue features a logo patch and 2002R branding can be found on the lateral heel. The shoe sits atop an off-white sole.

What we like best about this shoe are the hairy suede overlays that are reminiscent of the texture of linen, adding a unique touch. The New Balance 2002R Linen was released on December 13, 2023, for a price of $145.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Sandstone is a sneaker built using the MR 2002 as inspiration. Combining an aesthetic from the early 2000s, durability, support, and comfort, this running shoe delivers.

The upper of the Protection Pack Sandstone iteration of the New Balance 2002R is created using a mesh-like textile base overlaid with nubuck leather that gives the shoe both style and support. The fusion of the two materials creates balance and breathability to offer your foot comfort stride after stride. The laces, tongue, and sock liner are all a creamy sand color to match the primary color represented throughout the upper. New Balance branding appears on the gray insoles and the gray tongue tag.

What we love most about this shoe is the high-tech and high-performance capabilities of the sole unit. Stability Web technology provides arch support, while a midsole created from ABZORB, N-ergy, and ABZORB SBS in the heel provides cushioning and energy return. The gray rubber outsole provides more impact absorption and traction. The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Sandstone was released on September 21, 2023, for a retail price of $160.

The New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey arrives in a monochrome suede with a leather and mesh construction.

The New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey has got the "N" logo placed on both sides of the shoe and also on the front part of the shoe's outsole. The New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey mesh uppers have overlays of black leather and suede engulfing the silhouette. The design includes a grey and black sole unit, a bright white midfoot motif, and metallic silver rears. 
  
  The New Balance 2002R Black Dark Grey was released in June 2022 and retailed for $140.

name: New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Black Grey

details.description:
The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Black Grey comes in a black and gray color palette.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Black Grey has an upper that is constructed from a variety of black and gray materials, including durable mesh and breathable synthetic overlays. The classic "N" emblem appears in contrasting white and black on the sides. The midsole features a white and grey colorway. The ABZORB technology included in the shoe's cushioned midsole provides shock absorption and responsiveness. The shoe’s black outsole is constructed from long-lasting rubber with a directional tread pattern for superior grip and traction. The lacing system offers a customized fit, while the cushioned tongue and collar provide comfort and stability.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Black Grey was released for a retail price of $170 on March 3rd, 2023.

name: New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Navy Grey

details.description:
The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Navy Grey is a reimagined iteration of the iconic New Balance 2002R sneakers.

Designed by Yue Wu, this sneaker features an upper with a mesh base, overlayed by jagged suede overlays along its mudguard, midfoot, heel, and toebox. Most overlays are navy blue, while the overlays on the bottom portion of the heel and toebox are grey. Rounding out the shoe’s design is a white and earth-tone midsole paired with a black rubber outsole.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Navy Grey first hit the market on Valentine’s Day 2023. At the time of its release, this shoe had a retail price of $170.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Driftwood design comes with worn-in hairy suede uppers that go well with the base's breathable mesh. 

The stable N-Ergy technology and web underfoot provide comfort. The upper is decorated with 3M reflective details as well as several New Balance-related motifs, most notably the distinctive N logo. Featuring mesh below, the sneaker has a beige-colored fabric. The shoe is made of calf suede and has a comfortable, cushioned sole. Other details include a red NB logo on its insole, a logo patch on its side, front lace-up fastening, and a round toe.

The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Driftwood was released in March 2023. The sneaker retailed at $170.

The New Balance 2002R Marblehead Light Aluminum was originally released in 2005. Its minimalist features shades of grey colorway.

The stylish and versatile New Balance 2002R Marblehead Light Aluminum top features several colors of grey. Its design is of the platinum fabric base and supple leather details. It consists of a netting top with a plain, perforated ashy faux leather surface. It also displays a matching outsole that complements the finishing. The New Balance 2002R Marblehead Light Aluminum has ABZORB innovation and N-ergy padding underfoot.

The New Balance 2002R Marblehead Light Aluminum was released in September of 2020 for a price of $140.

The New Balance 2002R Gore-Tex JJJJound Pine is a collaboration between the iconic sneaker company and the menswear design collective founded in Montreal by Justin R. Saunders.

The New Balance x JJJJound 2002R Gore-Tex Pine features an upper with a rugged base of tightly woven black mesh. This is overlaid with thick mottled green suede strips that bolster the upper at the toe cap, eyestays, quarter panel, collar, and heel. The signature side panel N puffs out in black leather and features reflective detailing. Black rope laces with a black lace lock add to the rugged look of this upper. Dual branding adorns the black heel counter, and Gore-Tex branding appears above 2002R debossed branding at the outer collar. This durable upper rests on a black ABZORB midsole with an SBS ABZORB unit in the heel for ultimate cushioning over rugged terrain. The black rubber outsole is deeply lugged for multi-surface traction.

What we appreciate most about this rugged pair of kicks is the Gore-Tex inner bootie designed to keep your foot dry. The New Balance 2002R Gore-Tex JJJJound Pine was released on February 15, 2024, for $190 retail.

name: New Balance 2002R Grey Black JD Sports Exclusive

details.description:
The New Balance 2002R Grey Black JD Sports Exclusive comes in a grey and black color scheme.

The New Balance 2002R Grey Black JD Sports Exclusive has an upper constructed from leather and textile elements for long-lasting wear and breathability. The sneaker's midsole is composed of EVA foam, which is both lightweight and responsive, providing padding and comfort. The shoe's outsole features durable rubber used for grip and longevity. The shoe features an "N" logo on the lateral sides and "NB" on the heel. A "2002R" is displayed on one side of the shoe. The sneaker's design is completed by a "new balance running" lettering on the tongue.

The New Balance 2002R Grey Black JD Sports Exclusive was released on January 1, 2022, and retailed for $140.

name: New Balance 2002R Mule Protection Pack Rain Cloud
